crushing releases sugars which can damage teeth.
Potatoes, bread, rice, pasta and 
other starchy carbohydrates
Carbohydrates are satisfying without 
containing too many calories, and are an 
important	source	of	vitamins	and	fibre.	
They include bread, potatoes, breakfast 
cereals, pasta, rice, oats, noodles, maize, 
millet, yams, cornmeal and sweet potatoes.
